title: "The Deification of Power is the Ultimate Motivational Personality": Heidegger's Fall as a Warning
description:
Mark and Karen (finally!) finish analyzing the conversation that is almost psychedelic. Along the way, we talk Kant, Heidegger and the loss of enchantment.

A playlist of previous episodes in which we analyze section by section the almost psychedelic conversation between Jordan Peterson and John Vervaeke:  
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoARw9zo4EUYEEhM_KIgzl_eW9ZZTHbzh

Mark's channel:  Navigating Patterns
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgIbaWd7raqeIGUS1cHNgPg

The Hebrew word for loyal love:  Hesed
https://www.gotquestions.org/meaning-of-hesed.html

Karen's websites:
https://karenwongart.com
https://themeaningcode.com
